title: Elegant Dalian Sports Center Escape on China's Yellow Sea Coast
description: The Crowne Plaza Dalian Sports Center, an IHG Hotel, is perfect for sports fanatics looking for a stylish and convenient stay. Get in touch with your inner gastronome at Cai Feng Lou, re-energise at the expansive fitness centre and swimming pool and refresh at Champions Cafe. When it's time to explore, you'll find yourself steps from Dalian Stadium and the Football Museum, where you can get your sporting fix before retiring for a restful slumber.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dalian Sports Center, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.26 Sports Center Ganjingzi District, Dalian 116000, China

title: Five-Star Dalian Escape on China's Yellow Sea Coast
description: With urban views and sea-salt breezes, beach meets luxury at InterContinental Dalian, and IHG Hotel, set in the heart of one of China's most cosmopolitan cities. Engage in retail therapy, visit the scenic seaside for some sand and sun or admire the architecture of this remarkable city, in the knowledge that five-star amenities await after your adventures. Refresh with a dip in the sizeable swimming pool, dig into scrumptious seafood and Sichuan cuisine at the onsite restaurant, or simply relax in your comfortable room overlooking the harbour.
offer_address: No.6 Youhao Square, Zhongshan District, Dalian, 116001, China

title: Seaview Dalian Stay Minutes from Xinghai Square with Sky-High Views
description: Showcasing sweeping urban views and sea-salt sights, Crowne Plaza Dalian Xinghai, an IHG Hotel, is a gleaming beacon in a cosmopolitan Chinese city where beach meets boutique. Sample scrumptious seafood delicacies at Cai Feng Lou restaurant or enjoy a refined cocktail at Cheers Bar. If you have energy to burn, engage in retail therapy at the malls of Xinghai Square, take a dip in the pool or get out for some sand and sun at Xinghai Bay Beach.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dalian Xinghai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 60-1 Binhe Street, Shahekou District, Dalian 116001, China
